divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home after classes at URI due west: took south road cut-through to get to 102 from route 1 and after slowing down greatly to take the turn in the light rain. it crossed perpendicular and I only had clear view for maybe 7-10 seconds and it was visible for maybe 30-45 seconds. Flying extremely low and almost overhead was a disc shaped object that I confidently made out due to the pulsing light. every other second it seemed it lit up the neasrestsky in a circular radius to a dark shade of electric blue. It had 3 lights in a V shape pointing forward and was tailed a few hundred meters behind by a large plane at the same altitude. too dark to get any more details.
trends: There have been 66 other sightings in South Kingstown
There were no other sightings in South Kingstown on or around February 16th 2012
Summary: black disc, 3 red/yellow lights in a v pointing forwatd, pulsating blue
